mapper.select: SELECT resume_id as resumeId, resume_file_id as resumeFileId, resume_file_name as resumeFileName, resume_file_real_name as resumeFileRealName, resume_file_type as resumeFileType, resume_file_size as resumeFileSize, resume_file_ext as resumeFileExt FROM resume_file WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume_file( resume_id, resume_file_name, resume_file_real_name, resume_file_type, resume_file_size, resume_file_ext ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{resumeFileName}, #{resumeFileRealName}, #{resumeFileType}, #{resumeFileSize}, #{resumeFileExt} )
